body_html:
Adding following lines to .bashrc worked for me!!

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/"
body_text:
Adding following lines to .bashrc worked for me!!
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/"
body:
Adding following lines to .bashrc worked for me!!

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/"
